title: Gothic 3 Speech_English.pak
description:
For those who have downloaded the German version of Gothic 3, this is the Speech_English.pak, i.e. the speech file of English version of Gothic 3. So you don\&#039;t need to download the whole image of English version again.

Just put it in \\Gothic III\\Data, then open \\My Documents\\gothic3\\UserOptions.ini, change

VoiceLanguage=German
SubtitleLanguage=German

to

VoiceLanguage=English
SubtitleLanguage=English

save and play.
